Staging
Compact size

If you need a smaller version of the navbar, just use .navbar-sm to reduce the height.

Command bar

A command bar can be displayed below the navbar to show page-level actions, including actions that apply to a group of selected items.

  • Edit
  • Delete
  • Export
  • Merge
Vertical navbar

Secondary navigation lists can be displayed using a vertical navbar.
